segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the beginning of a message and to transmit identifying number.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to provide a reference relating to the whole message, such as: - reference to previous message.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to identify a party and related contacts.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment to identify a name and address of a party, such as: - message sender - message recipient - ordering customer/principal - ordering customer agent

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department for the party, such as: - information contact

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to specify details for the arriving means of transport.

segment.name: Details of transport
segment.documentation: TDT, A segment to identify the transport details of the arriving vessel.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to identify a relevant reference number, such as: - Customs declaration number - shipping line reference

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to identify locations related to the transport details, such as: - previous port of call - next port of call - place/port of discharge

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to identify a date and time related to the arrival of the means of transport, such as: - estimated arrival - estimated departure

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to provide supplementary information related to the means of transport, such as: - additional remarks related to the transport - remarks

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to specify total numbers.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, A segment to specify the planned number of operations on equipment for the arriving vessel.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to provide supplementary information related to the planned number of operations on equipment.
